column4: The only big problem I have with it is that I'm not able to change the visual effects from 'none' to 'normal' or 'extra'. It actually does let me change but it doesn't have any effect on anything. Once I close appearance settings and open it up again, the setting is back to 'none'.
I'm using Acer Aspire One AOA-150 -netbook and Ubuntu 10.04 Netbook Edition.
you are probably running unity 2d mode
